channel.description: I need all npc emotes you have. Pm me them =]

item.title: N.P.C. Emotes
item.dc:creator: @Paintball199 Paintball199
item.description:
@Paintball199 wrote:

Lol? I have Fully Working Kalphite Queen With Dieing Emotes Wanna See?
I have Fully Working Jad, Uhmmm All Kalphite Attack,Dieing Emotes. Uhmmm And some More.

Here some Pics :

Queen Nr 1 : Dieing Emote :

Queen Nr 2 : Dieing Emote :

Queen Nr 1 : Attack emote :

Queen Nr 2 : Attack Emote :

Thats not all I Have I have some more but to Bored to Post more. lol. Next time I post Jad.

Good Luck LeScape. A Hint : The IDS are around the NPC Id.

item.title: N.P.C. Emotes
item.dc:creator: @muhascape_owner muhascape owner
item.description:
@muhascape_owner wrote:

i got jads

open npchandler.java and search for

npcs[i].animNumber = 0x03E; //cow dead } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 41) { npcs[i].animNumber = 0x039; //chicken dead } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 87) { npcs[i].animNumber = 0x08D; //rat dead
then add

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { npcs[i].animNumber = 2654; //TzTi Jad DEADnow find

npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x03B; //cow attack } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 41) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x037; //chicken attack } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) {now add this

npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2652; // TzTok-Jad attack } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 87) {
now save compile and now have fun
